title: Baseball Owners Call Up Commissioner Bud Selig's Relief
teaser: Major League Baseball owners have selected Rob Manfred to succeed Bud Selig as the league's commissioner. Manfred is the sport's 10th commissioner, selected after six rounds of voting by the 30 MLB owners. Sportswriter Stefan Fatsis joins Robert Siegel to speak about the news.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
